attributes.action: A Knighthood for Gary Verity - Grand Depart 2014
attributes.additional_details:
In recognition of the huge success of Le Grand Depart 2014, the way that Welcome to Yorkshire mobilised not just The County of Yorkshire, but the whole country.
Promoting Yorkshire & Britain as a visitor destination across the world.
This honour would not just be for Mr a Verity but for a Yorkshire as a whole
